Module com.example.project4software_methodology
Package com.example.project4software_methodology

Class SpecialityController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4software_methodology.SpecialityController
public class SpecialityController extends Object
Controller class for managing the Speciality Pizza ordering section of the application. This class handles the UI logic for selecting pizza types, sizes, and additional toppings, and interacts with the PizzaMaker class to create pizzas based on these selections.
Author:
Rohan Parikh & Ganesh Konda

  • Constructor Details

    • SpecialityController

      public SpecialityController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. This method sets up the initial state and populates UI components with default values.

    • pickerFunction

      protected void pickerFunction()
      Configures the behavior for the specialty pizza choice picker. This method updates the toppings list and pizza price based on the selected pizza type.

    • updatePizzaImage

      private void updatePizzaImage(String pizzaType)
      Updates the pizza image based on the selected pizza type.
      Parameters:
      pizzaType - The type of pizza for which the image needs to be updated.

    • sizeFunction

      protected void sizeFunction()
      Configures the behavior for the size choice picker. Updates the displayed pizza price when a different size is selected.

    • toppingsFunction

      protected void toppingsFunction()
      Configures the listeners for additional toppings checkboxes. Updates the pizza and its price when extra sauce or cheese options are selected or deselected.

    • updatePizzaAndPrice

      private void updatePizzaAndPrice()
      Updates the displayed pizza and its price. This method is triggered when there is a change in pizza type, size, or additional toppings.

    • pizzaButton

      protected void pizzaButton()
      Handles the action of adding a pizza to the current order. Validates the selection and adds the configured pizza to the order, updating the store's order records.

    • clearAll

      protected void clearAll()
      Clears all the current selections in the UI. Resets the pizza type, size, toppings choices, and displayed price to default states.

    • createToppingList

      protected javafx.collections.ObservableList<Topping> createToppingList(String type)
      Creates a list of toppings based on the selected pizza type.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of pizza for which the toppings list is to be created.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Toppings specific to the given pizza type.

    • showWarning

      private void showWarning(String message)

    • showInformation

      private void showInformation(String message)
